formula.name: 4th Celtic Burning Ship Partial Real
formula.reference: Xrn = abs(Xr2 * Xr2 + Xi2 * Xi2 - 6 * Xr2 * Xi2) + Cr; Xin = 4 * abs(Xr) * Xi * (Xr2 - Xi2) + Ci;
formula.perturbation: xrn = diffabs(Xr2 * Xr2 + Xi2 * Xi2 - 6 * Xr2 * Xi2, 4 * Xr2 * Xr * xr + 6 * Xr2 * xr2 + 4 * Xr * xr2 * xr + xr2 * xr2 + 4 * Xi2 * Xi * xi + 6 * Xi2 * xi2 + 4 * Xi * xi2 * xi + xi2 * xi2 - 12 * xr * Xr * Xi2 - 6 * xr2 * Xi2 - 12 * xi * Xr2 * Xi - 24 * xr * xi * Xr * Xi - 12 * xr2 * xi * Xi - 6 * xi2 * Xr2 - 12 * xr * xi2 * Xr - 6 * xr2 * xi2) + cr; xin = abs(Xr + xr) * (4 * Xr2 * xi + 8 * Xr * xr * Xi + 8 * Xr * xr * xi + 4 * xr2 * Xi + 4 * xr2 * xi - 12 * xi * Xi2 - 12 * xi2 * Xi - 4 * xi2 * xi) + diffabs(Xr, xr) * (4 * Xr2 * Xi - 4 * Xi2 * Xi) + ci;
